name: Spacecraft Scraps
description:
How to play: 

- Navigate menus and press buttons using mouse and left click

- Move around the game using the arrow keys

- There will be scrap parts scrambled around the world, locate the new scrap before the timer reaches 0. When you collect a scrap part a new one is placed randomly around the map. 

Story:
-Your Space-shuttle crashed as you were exploring far away planets, find the scrap parts before they disappear to make it back home.

Assets and materials:

Game engine: Construct 3

Music and sound effects: Jsfxr.me and BeepBox

Pixel art using PixilArt.com

Space background by WestBeam on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/space-background-1)

This is my first game jam game, hope you enjoy :D
